@RequestMapping(value = "/getUnifyOrderDetails")
    public ApiResult getUnifyOrderDetails(
            @RequestParam(value = "uno_id",required = true) final Long uno_id
    ){
        return this.apiHandler(new ApiInvoker() {
            @Override
            public Object invoke() {
                System.out.println("uno_id是："+uno_id);
                ApiController.ApiModelAndView mv = new ApiController.ApiModelAndView("unify/unifyGoods_order_detail");
                // 需要获取订单详情、订单商品详情、支付信息、退款信息、退款日志、订单记录
                UnifyOrderExEntity unifyOrderExEntity = unifyOrderService.selectUnifyOrderById(uno_id);
                if(unifyOrderExEntity.getDeliverAddressEntity()!=null&&unifyOrderExEntity.getDeliverAddressEntity().getAddressArea()==null){
                    unifyOrderExEntity.setDeliverAddressEntity(deliverAddressService.parseZonePath(unifyOrderExEntity.getDeliverAddressEntity()));
                }
                mv.addModelAndViewObject("unifyOrder",unifyOrderExEntity);

                RefundOrderEntityExample example = new RefundOrderEntityExample();
                example.createCriteria().andAssociateIdEqualTo(uno_id).andAssociateTypeEqualTo(NumberGenerateService.NumberType.UNIFY_ORDER).andSellerIdEqualTo(unifyOrderExEntity.getSellerId()).andStatusEqualTo(RefundOrderStatus.REFUND_SUCCESS);
                List<RefundOrderExEntity> refundOrders = refundOrderService.getRefundOrderListForUnifyOrder(example);
                mv.addModelAndViewObject("refundOrders",refundOrders);

                UnifyOrderLogEntityExample entityExample = new UnifyOrderLogEntityExample();
                entityExample.createCriteria().andOrderIdEqualTo(uno_id);
                List<UnifyOrderLogExEntity> logExEntities = unifyOrderService.selectOrderLogByExample(entityExample);
                mv.addModelAndViewObject("logs",logExEntities);
                return mv;
            }
        });
    }








public DeliverAddressEntity parseZonePath(DeliverAddressEntity addressEntity){
        List<GlobalRegionEntity> globalRegionEntities = globalRegionService.getLevelRegionEntityByPath(addressEntity.getZonePath());
        if(globalRegionEntities != null){
            StringBuffer address = new StringBuffer();
            String province = "";
            String city = "";
            String area = "";
            for(int i = 0;i<globalRegionEntities.size();i++){
                GlobalRegionEntity globalRegionEntity = globalRegionEntities.get(i);
                if(globalRegionEntity.getRegionType()==1){
                    province = globalRegionEntity.getRegionName();
                }
                else if(globalRegionEntity.getRegionType()==2){
                    city = globalRegionEntity.getRegionName();
                }
                else if(globalRegionEntity.getRegionType()==3){
                    area = globalRegionEntity.getRegionName();
                }
            }
            address.append(province).append(city).append(area);
            addressEntity.setAddressArea(address.toString());
        }
        return addressEntity;
    }
